text: The Bay Area is the urban area surrounding the San Francisco Bay in Northern California. Bay Area may also refer to: *Blockhouse Bay, a suburb in Auckland, New Zealand *Greater Tokyo area, an area around Tokyo Bay *Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area, an area around Guangdong, Macau and Hong Kong *Monterey Bay Area, an area around Monterey Bay, California *Tampa Bay Area, an area around Tampa Bay, Florida *Galveston Bay Area, an area around Galveston Bay, Texas
title: Bay Area (disambiguation)
